about.label: About Me
about.title: Curious about me? Here you have it.
about.description:
I'm a Mobile Developer with over Three Years of Experience building applications across government, industrial, and enterprise sectors. I’m passionate about SOLID principles and Clean Architecture, and have contributed to both end-user products and internal mobile libraries (SDKs). Skilled at working independently and collaboratively, I'm committed to continuously growing in the mobile engineering space.

My background includes a Bachelor's degree in Informatics Engineering from Universitas Dian Nuswantoro, with academic focus on machine learning and mobile cybersecurity. Outside of mobile, I’ve also developed web and desktop applications using a variety of modern technologies and frameworks, ensuring clean, maintainable, and scalable solutions.

skills.label: Skills
skills.title: The skills, tools and technologies I am really good at:

experience.label: Experience
experience.title: Here is a quick summary of my most recent experiences:

items.title: Mobile Developer
responsibilities: Developed production-grade Android applications that integrated with medical hardware using USB and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), enabling real-time device communication and control.
Led technical research initiatives into BLE protocols, video conferencing SDKs, and on-device machine learning models (TensorFlow Lite) for real-time diagnostics and embedded AI use cases.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including firmware engineers and backend developers to deliver high-reliability Android apps for medical use.

items.title: Android Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Implemented new features using Clean MVVM & MVP architecture and developed unit/UI tests achieving over 70% test coverage in Kotlin and Java codebases.
Refactored legacy modules and resolved bugs to enhance stability and performance of the Travel Activities section within the Traveloka Android app.
Researched and proposed integration strategies for Jetpack Compose and modern Android libraries to improve developer efficiency and UI responsiveness.

items.title: Mobile Developer
responsibilities: Designed, developed, and deployed cross-platform mobile applications using Kotlin, Java, and Flutter for diverse clients across healthcare, education, and retail sectors.
Built RESTful API backends using Node.js and Laravel to support mobile features such as authentication, real-time updates, and secure data storage.
Led agile-based development sprints, coordinated with remote teams, and maintained version control using GitHub and GitLab CI/CD pipelines.

items.title: Mobile Developer Intern
responsibilities: Built and maintained Android application features using Java and Kotlin, integrated Firebase services including Realtime Database and Crashlytics.
Practiced version control (Git) and participated in collaborative code reviews as part of a remote internship program simulating real-world development environments.
Optimized existing app performance through profiling and refactoring efforts aligned with Clean Architecture principles.

contact.description: Let’s work together! Drop me a line below or email me directly.
